gridtype  = projection
gridsize  = 231966
xsize     = 526
ysize     = 441
xname     = rlon
xlongname = "rotated longitude"
xunits    = "degrees"
yname     = rlat
ylongname = "rotated latitude"
yunits    = "degrees"
xfirst    = -22.6375
xinc      = 0.0625
yfirst    = -11.2
yinc      = 0.0625
grid_mapping = rotated_pole
grid_mapping_name = rotated_latitude_longitude
long_name = "coordinates of the rotated North Pole"
grid_north_pole_latitude = 39.25f
grid_north_pole_longitude = -162.f
